channel.title: A remake
channel.description:
Well I got bored so I thought I'd make a remake. Well as many of you may know I'm the ex-core designer/programmer of RS-Reborn.
I will only be programming this when I have the time and feel like it so it will not go very fast. I still need to come up with a name.
This base is a scratch base coded by me and is based on 464 revision of RuneScape.
Dowload client [url=http://464-remake.zapto.org/download/client.jar]here[/url]
NOTE: The server will not always be on so if the client doesn't load it means the server is offline.
NOTE: A lot of the content done on the server has been added to the project thread this only gets updated when I feel like. For example friends list has been done but no pictures or info has been writen about it, if you would like more info about the project feel free to add my skype Sage-159.
Plans:
Ideas:
Progress:
Done Working Not started
Mining:-
[ul][li]Standard Mining[/li] [li]Random events[/li][/ul]
Woodcutting:-
[ul][li]Standard Woodcutting[/li] [li]Random events[/li][/ul]
Herblore:-
[ul][li]Standard Herblore[/li] [li]Random events[/li][/ul]
Fletching:-
[ul][li]Standard Fletching[/li] [li]Random events[/li][/ul]
Clipping:-
[ul][li]Handles both npcs and players[/li] [li]Region based[/li] [li]Pathfinding[/li][/ul]
Friend List:-
[ul][li]Standard Friend List[/li] [li]Muti world support (Just need login server)[/li][/ul]
Npc:-
[ul][li]Random walking which has clipping[/li][/ul]
Pictures:
Mining:-
[IMG]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/3595/mininglo.png[/img]
Npc clipping:-
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/eadd927d86884a1cfdfbadd6c4017597.png[/img]
Random/Untiled pictures:
Here are a few pictures of what I have done and a few are just random ones :D
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/kjwxo20d5/IMG_06112011_040515.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/k8k2p19ax/IMG_06112011_041038.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/wogsis2mx/IMG_06112011_044820.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/64o7gn23d/IMG_18032011_000521.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/iluv3sx95/IMG_28062011_155537.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/xkd9y8cbd/IMG_28062011_232537.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/3v035vt5l/IMG_29062011_124053.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/bp0ora0yh/IMG_30062011_195736_Copy.png[/img]
[img]http://s7.postimage.org/63jbkc6l5/IMG_30062011_195949.png[/img]
Developers:
[ul][li]X-logic - Sever, website and content programmer.[/li][/ul]
Will be adding more to this later also may redo the lay out.

item.title: A remake
item.dc:creator: @x-logic x-logic
item.description:
@x-logic wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:55, topic:415257”][quote author=x-logic link=topic=517216.msg3807256#msg3807256 date=1320578424]

This is Nazi! Naiz! But yeah, it looks epic.

Thanks any ideas on what quest I should do next and if anyone would like to help I have a few jobs yous can do even if you can’t code you can still help add my skype if you would like to help thanks
[/quote]

I can give you an idea for a quest, Why don’t you make a faction quest, what I mean is that you should make a quest where if people do complete it, they can create their own group and stoof like that, thats just an idea you can add on to and sheett.[/quote]

This is a remake so if it wasn’t in rs when it was 464 then It will not be add there will only be custum minigames added to the server however these will be done professionally as if rs had made them thats means no stupid height changing it will be done right but thanks for the idea

Read full topic

[quote=“enzo42, post:41, topic:415257”][quote author=x-logic link=topic=517216.msg3764893#msg3764893 date=1317159975]
I have redone my region clipping system.

Who thinks I should let people play as the server gets coded?
[/quote]

You done more then rs2006 did in 3 months lol and your alone[/quote]

I know and I have college todo plus I hardly do rsps anymore and I also am working on another project nothing todo with rsps.

I’m not sure what Ill be doing with this server may sell it or find another coder to join or release the base not sure for now.

Oh btw alot of the stuff this base has hasn’t been listed on the project thread.
